value.stringValue: We found an existing Contact and existing Opp for this registration/webcode. please review this thoroughly to ensure it is a duplicate and not a mistake.

assignments.name: Assign_Matching_Contact_Opp_Task_T
assignments.label: Assign Matching Contact & Opp Task T

value.stringValue: We found an existing Contact and existing Opp for this registration/webcode. please review this thoroughly to ensure it is a duplicate and not a mistake.

RGP is 10% of the Room Rate. Cancel for any reason up to 120 hours prior to the groups scheduled departure. Receive a refund less the cost of RGP, Airfare, NSF fees or Chargeback Fees. To reiterate, RGP does not cover refunds towards airfare.

RGP is 10% of the Room Rate. Cancel for any reason up to 120 hours prior to the groups scheduled departure. Receive a refund less the cost of RGP, Airfare, NSF fees or Chargeback Fees. To reiterate, RGP does not cover refunds towards airfare.

formulas.name: airfareCountDecider
formulas.expression: IF({!shirtCountVar}=1, TEXT({!$Record.Airfare_PAX_1__c}), IF({!shirtCountVar}=2, TEXT({!$Record.Airfare_PAX_2__c}), IF({!shirtCountVar}=3, TEXT({!$Record.Airfare_PAX_3__c}), IF({!shirtCountVar}=4, TEXT({!$Record.Airfare_PAX_4__c}), IF({!shirtCountVar}=5, TEXT({!$Record.Airfare_PAX_5__c}), IF({!shirtCountVar}=6, TEXT({!$Record.Airfare_PAX_6__c}), ''))))))

formulas.name: banquetDeciderFormula
formulas.expression: IF(AND({!shirtCountVar}=1, {!$Record.X1_Remove_Banquet__c}=true), 'Remove', IF(AND({!shirtCountVar}=2, {!$Record.X2_Remove_Banquet__c}=true), 'Remove', IF(AND({!shirtCountVar}=3, {!$Record.X3_Remove_Banquet__c}=true), 'Remove', IF(AND({!shirtCountVar}=4, {!$Record.X4_Remove_Banquet__c}=true), 'Remove', IF(AND({!shirtCountVar}=5, {!$Record.X5_Remove_Banquet__c}=true), 'Remove', IF(AND({!shirtCountVar}=6, {!$Record.X6_Remove_Banquet__c}=true), 'Remove', 'Keep'))))))

formulas.name: cardYearFormula
formulas.expression: IF(RIGHT({!$Record.Exp_Date__c}, 2)='23', '2023', IF(RIGHT({!$Record.Exp_Date__c}, 2)='24', '2024', IF(RIGHT({!$Record.Exp_Date__c}, 2)='25', '2025', IF(RIGHT({!$Record.Exp_Date__c}, 2)='26', '2026', IF(RIGHT({!$Record.Exp_Date__c}, 2)='27', '2027', IF(RIGHT({!$Record.Exp_Date__c}, 2)='28', '2028', IF(RIGHT({!$Record.Exp_Date__c}, 2)='29', '2029', IF(RIGHT({!$Record.Exp_Date__c}, 2)='30', '2030', IF(RIGHT({!$Record.Exp_Date__c}, 2)='31', '2031', IF(RIGHT({!$Record.Exp_Date__c}, 2)='32', '2032', IF(RIGHT({!$Record.Exp_Date__c}, 2)='33', '2033', IF(RIGHT({!$Record.Exp_Date__c}, 2)='34', '2034', IF(RIGHT({!$Record.Exp_Date__c}, 2)='35', '2035', IF(RIGHT({!$Record.Exp_Date__c}, 2)='36', '2036', IF(RIGHT({!$Record.Exp_Date__c}, 2)='37', '2037', IF(RIGHT({!$Record.Exp_Date__c}, 2)='38', '2038', IF(RIGHT({!$Record.Exp_Date__c}, 2)='39', '2039', '')))))))))))))))))

formulas.name: RGPFormulaIFstatement
formulas.expression: IF(AND({!Get_Opp_Package_1_TAG.Id} != null, {!Get_Opp_Package_2_TAG.Id} = null, {!Get_Opp_Package_3_TAG.Id} = null), FLOOR({!Get_Opp_Package_1_TAG.UnitPrice}*(1/10)), IF(AND({!Get_Opp_Package_1_TAG.Id} != null, {!Get_Opp_Package_2_TAG.Id} != null, {!Get_Opp_Package_3_TAG.Id} = null), FLOOR(({!Get_Opp_Package_1_TAG.UnitPrice}+{!Get_Opp_Package_2_TAG.UnitPrice})*(1/10)), IF(AND({!Get_Opp_Package_1_TAG.Id} != null, {!Get_Opp_Package_2_TAG.Id} != null, {!Get_Opp_Package_3_TAG.Id} != null), FLOOR(({!Get_Opp_Package_1_TAG.UnitPrice}+{!Get_Opp_Package_2_TAG.UnitPrice}+{!Get_Opp_Package_3_TAG.UnitPrice})*(1/10)), 0)))

formulas.name: shirtCountSizeFormula
formulas.expression: IF({!shirtCountVar}=1, TEXT({!$Record.X1_Shirt_Size_25_00__c}), IF({!shirtCountVar}=2, TEXT({!$Record.X2_Shirt_Size_25_00__c}), IF({!shirtCountVar}=3, TEXT({!$Record.X3_Shirt_Size_25_00__c}), IF({!shirtCountVar}=4, TEXT({!$Record.X4_Shirt_Size_25_00__c}), IF({!shirtCountVar}=5, TEXT({!$Record.X5_Shirt_Size_25_00__c}), IF({!shirtCountVar}=6, TEXT({!$Record.X6_Shirt_Size_25_00__c}), ''))))))

formulas.name: shirtProductNameForCollectionFormula
formulas.expression: IF({!shirtCollectionCountVar}=1, 'Shirt Small', IF({!shirtCollectionCountVar}=2, 'Shirt Medium', IF({!shirtCollectionCountVar}=3, 'Shirt Large', IF({!shirtCollectionCountVar}=4, 'Shirt XL', IF({!shirtCollectionCountVar}=5, 'Shirt XXL', '')))))

formulas.name: themParkRemovalFormula
formulas.expression: IF(AND({!shirtCountVar}=1, {!$Record.X1_Remove_Theme_Park__c}=true), 'Remove', IF(AND({!shirtCountVar}=2, {!$Record.X2_Remove_Theme_Park__c}=true), 'Remove', IF(AND({!shirtCountVar}=3, {!$Record.X3_Remove_Theme_Park__c}=true), 'Remove', IF(AND({!shirtCountVar}=4, {!$Record.X4_Remove_Theme_Park__c}=true), 'Remove', IF(AND({!shirtCountVar}=5, {!$Record.X5_Remove_Theme_Park__c}=true), 'Remove', IF(AND({!shirtCountVar}=6, {!$Record.X6_Remove_Theme_Park__c}=true), 'Remove', 'Keep'))))))

textTemplates.name: failureEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Hi Todd,


We had a failure in the automation when creating Registration: {!$Record.Name}.


PLease review this registration as well as the Flow Interview.


Thank you,
